title: Ane godlie tractate or mirrour. Quhairintill may be easilie perceauit quho thay be that are ingraftit in to Christ, a[n]d quho are nocht. Declaring also the rewaird of the godlie and punyschement of the wekit. ... Compyld in meter, be William Lauder, minister of the wourd of God  ...
author: Lauder, William, 1520?-1573.
